data.lyric:
[ti:Hard To Get]
[ar:蔡徐坤]
[al:Hard To Get]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Hard To Get - 蔡徐坤 (KUN)
[00:06.61]Written By：蔡徐坤（KUN）/Bijan/John A Fallon IV/Gino Borri
[00:13.23]Produced by：蔡徐坤（KUN）/Bijan
[00:19.85]You you you play hard to get
[00:24.74]You you you play hard to get
[00:29.28]And I don't know how much I can give
[00:33.82]Cuz you you you play hard to get
[00:39.54]Did you ever think about us
[00:41.78]U been playing this game too tough
[00:44.39]Tried to give ya love
[00:46.43]Now I'm trying not to get fed up
[00:49.15]Tell me did you ever think about us
[00:51.30]Worked a long time just to earn ya trust
[00:53.95]I don't wanna make no fuss
[00:55.77]But I got a thousand bad batch lined up
[00:58.69]You the only girl that ain't signed up
[01:00.98]Got a lot of baijiu in my cup
[01:03.31]Tryna make a bae of you wussup
[01:05.78]Sending drunk texts when I'm in the club
[01:09.69]Did you understand what it was
[01:11.22]Do I gotta clear it up
[01:13.55]Swear I ain't in a rush
[01:15.02]I can only play with you so much
[01:17.55]You you you play hard to get
[01:22.30]You you you play hard to get
[01:26.72]And I don't know how much I can give
[01:31.29]Cuz you you oh you play hard to get
[01:36.92]想说的话太多总被收回
[01:39.36]又是喝到烂醉断片了为止
[01:41.74]每到夜晚思念填满我的胃
[01:43.63]假装无所谓却天生一对
[01:47.19]去没人的岛
[01:48.70]摸鲨鱼的角
[01:49.70]写童谣和chase
[01:52.00]& I'd love to wait
[01:53.49]But I got a thousand bad batch lined up
[01:56.25]You the only girl that ain't signed up
[01:58.55]Got a lot of baijiu in my cup
[02:00.93]Tryna make a bae of you wussup
[02:03.36]Sending drunk texts when I'm in the club
[02:07.01]Did you understand what it was
[02:08.93]Do I gotta clear it up
[02:11.19]Swear I ain't in a rush
[02:12.67]I can only play with you so much
[02:15.12]You you you play hard to get
[02:20.01]You you you play hard to get
[02:24.28]And I don't know how much I can give
[02:28.62]Cuz you you you play hard to get
data.trans:
[ti:Hard To Get]
[ar:蔡徐坤]
[al:Hard To Get]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:06.61]//
[00:13.23]//
[00:19.85]欲擒故纵的你
[00:24.74]不可多得的你
[00:29.28]我不知道还有什么可以给予你
[00:33.82]因为你是这样的触不可及
[00:39.54]你有想过我们的关系吗?
[00:41.78]是你让这场游戏变得太过艰难
[00:44.39]试图让你体味爱情
[00:46.43]我努力不让自己感到厌倦
[00:49.15]告诉我 你有想过我们的未来吗?
[00:51.30]而我还在试图获得你的信任
[00:53.95]我无意小题大做
[00:55.77]但太多劣质感情在排队等我
[00:58.69]唯独你不在其中
[01:00.98]杯中盛满酒精
[01:03.31]想要把你捧在手心 可以吗？
[01:05.78]醉意朦胧中给你发着情话
[01:09.69]你明白它的意思吗？
[01:11.22]你明白我的本意吗？
[01:13.55]我发誓我并不那么快想要一个结果
[01:15.02]我会和你将这欲擒故纵的游戏继续到底
[01:17.55]欲擒故纵的你
[01:22.30]不可多得的你
[01:26.72]我不知道还有什么可以给予你
[01:31.29]因为你是这样的触不可及
[01:36.92]//
[01:39.36]//
[01:41.74]//
[01:43.63]//
[01:47.19]//
[01:48.70]//
[01:49.70]//
[01:52.00]我愿意为你等待
[01:53.49]但太多劣质感情在排队等我
[01:56.25]唯独你不在其中
[01:58.55]杯中盛满酒精
[02:00.93]想要把你捧在手心 可以吗？
[02:03.36]醉意朦胧中给你发着情话
[02:07.01]你明白它的意思吗？
[02:08.93]你明白我的本意吗？
[02:11.19]我发誓我并不那么快想要一个结果
[02:12.67]我会和你将这欲擒故纵的游戏继续到底
[02:15.12]欲擒故纵的你
[02:20.01]不可多得的你
[02:24.28]我不知道还有什么可以给予你
[02:28.62]因为你是这样的触不可及
